name: cfswitch
description:
Evaluates a passed expression and passes control to the cfcase
 tag that matches the expression result. You can, optionally,
 code a cfdefaultcase tag, which receives control if there is no
 matching cfcase tag value.

params.name: expression
params.description:
CFML expression that yields a scalar value.
 CFML converts integers, real numbers, Booleans, and
 dates to numeric values. For example, True, 1, and 1.0 are
 all equal.

examples.title: Script Syntax
Tag Syntax
examples.code:
<cfset fruit = ""> 
 <cfswitch expression="#fruit#"> 
 <cfcase value="Apple"> 
 <cfoutput>I like apples!</cfoutput> 
 </cfcase> 
 <cfcase value="Orange"> 
 <cfoutput>I like oranges!</cfoutput> 
 </cfcase> 
 <cfcase value="Kiwi"> 
 <cfoutput>I like kiwi!</cfoutput> 
 </cfcase> 
 <cfdefaultcase> 
 <cfoutput>Fruit, what fruit?</cfoutput> 
 </cfdefaultcase> 
 </cfswitch>
